clima.no args: You need to provide a city name!
clima.error 200: I couldn't get the current weather for the city: {0}
clima.error not 200: I couldn't get the weather forecast for the city: {0}
clima.message reply error: An error occurred while trying to get the weather.

config.permission: You do not have permission to use this command.
config.addFields: Select the language you want the bot to use.
config.description-en: Change the bot language to English
config.description-pt: Change the bot language to Portuguese
config.error: There was an error trying to update the language.

help.setDescription:
**Command list**

**`8ball`**: Ask a question and get an answer.
**`weather`**: Shows the weather conditions of a city.
**`config`**: Set the bot language.
**`flip`**: Toss a coin.
**`help`**: Displays all commands.
**`howgay`**: Measures how gay a person is.
**`jokenpo`**: Play a game of rock, paper, scissors.
**`monkey`**: Generates a random monkey.
**`ping`**: Calculates ping.
**`pp`**: Measure peepee.
**`server`**: Displays information about the server.
**`simp`**: Measures how simp someone is.
**`stank`**: Measure someone's stench.
**`user`**: Show information about the user.

jokenpo.reply rank error: An error occurred while retrieving the ranking
jokenpo.challenge: {0} has challenged {1} to a game of Rock Paper Scissors!
jokenpo.waiting:
{0} has challenged {1} to a game of Rock Paper Scissors!
*Waiting for {2} to respond...*
jokenpo.time up: Time's up! One or more players didn't choose in time.
jokenpo.error jokenpo: An error occurred while executing the Rock Paper Scissors command

macaco.no monkey found: Unable to find a monkey with image and description.
